## HierarchicalFacetsProps interface

Props for the [HierarchicalFacets()](./search-ui-react.hierarchicalfacets.md) component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HierarchicalFacetsProps extends Omit<StandardFacetsProps, 'searchable' | 'excludedFieldIds'>
```
